EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading the Migrating to Cloud-Native Application Architectures eBook
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading Migrating to Cloud-Native Application Architectures, authored by Pivotal’s Matt Stine. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you explore the benefits and promises of a cloud-native platform and a microservices architecture.
Given your interest in this eBook, we thought you might also find these resources of use:
- Analyst Report: Gartner’s Market Guide for Application Platforms <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/gartner-market-guide-for-application-platforms]]> - eBook: Crafting Your Cloud-Native Strategy <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/crafting-your-cloud-native-strategy]]> - White Paper: Migrating an ESB to a Cloud-Native Platform <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/migrating-an-esb-to-a-cloud-native-platform]]> - Report: The DZone Guide to Modern Java <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/the-dzone-guide-to-modern-java]]> - eBook: Cloud Foundry: The Cloud-Native Platform <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-foundry-the-cloud-native-platform]]> - White Paper: Supercharging Your Microservices With NetflixOSS and Spring Cloud <[[https://pivotal.io/supercharging-your-microservices-with-netflixoss-and-spring-cloud]]> - Blog: 5 Confessions Of A Platform Builder <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/case-studies/5-confessions-of-a-platform-builder]]> - Video: Help Developers Do What They Love <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xdw_9dADM-4]]> - White Paper: The Upside-Down Economics of Building Your Own Platform <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/the-upside-down-economics-of-building-your-own-platform]]>
